item.description:
We discuss our paths and evolution.  There will usually be a short talk on some spiritual subject and we also ask for suggestions for topics to discuss. Occasionally we have experts visit and give a seminar.  If someone in the group would like to give a talk, let me know.

Subjects that we will have discussions, talks, & classes about are whatever you are interested in and those listed in the group description in "About Us".  Feel free to email the organizer with subjects/traditions you want to know more about.
item.how_to_find_us: Corner of Walden St and Mass Ave.
item.name: Intros & discuss our Paths & Enlightenment Techniques
